shortDescription: Experience the breathtaking views and serene landscapes of Sajek Valley.

timeline.title: Relaxation and Departure
timeline.activities: Enjoy a leisurely morning before heading back home.

shortDescription: Embark on an exciting expedition through the majestic mountains of Bandarban

timeline.activities: Attempt a moderate climb to enjoy panoramic views.

shortDescription: Explore the scenic rivers and lush landscapes of Khagrachari.

tripTitle: Rangamati Lakeside Escape - Special Discount Offer

timeline.activities: Visit the local market and relax at your resort.
